about.title: about
description: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in Lima, Perú. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.

Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
